content: People in North Korea live in a prison camp. Muslim women are systematically oppressed. Gays are tossed from rooftops. And the writer finds times for this kind of trivial, first-world, self absorbed navel gazing. Seeking oppression with a microscope, hoping that the oppressor is a white male so it fits the narrative. All of this nonsense so an entitled fellow can claim the beloved victim status. Grow up.
